description: This file defines a React functional component called Sidebar, which renders a navigational sidebar with links to different sections (Overview, JIRA Projects, Confluence Pages, Connect Accounts) and an external link to API documentation. It uses Next.js specific hooks and components for client-side navigation and active link highlighting.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A React component that renders a navigation link with active state styling based on the current pathname.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: A React functional component that renders the entire sidebar including navigation items and external links.
